thread.title: Roberts Road to close for 20 days
thread.title_full: Roberts Road to close for 20 days

title: Roberts Road to close for 20 days
text: Daily Herald report Roberts Road in southwest Lake County will be closed to through traffic beginning Monday, Oct. 12, from Darrell Road to Route 59 for construction of a roundabout. River Road will remain closed, north of Kelsey Road, to through traffic as part of this phase of construction. The roundabout will be built during the closure, which is expected to last about 20 days. Roberts Road detour is Darrell Road to Route 176 to Route 12/59. The River Road detour is Kelsey Road to Route 59. Local traffic will have access to residences and businesses within the closure area up to the intersection. For additional information regarding this project, visit www.riverroberts.com . Share this page
